Source.Name: gloox
Source.Summary: Full-featured Jabber/XMPP client library, written in clean ANSI C++
Source.Description: gloox is a rock-solid, full-featured Jabber/XMPP client library written in C++. It makes writing spec-compliant clients easy and allows for hassle-free integration of Jabber/XMPP functionality into existing applications.
